title: True Friendship Shines
body:
INT. SCHOOL CAFETERIA - DAY

Jimmy sits alone at a corner table, his lunch tray untouched. The chatter of students and clinking of silverware fill the room. He watches as groups of friends laugh and share stories, feeling invisible in the crowded cafeteria.

JIMMY (to himself)
I wish I had a friend to sit with.

Just then, the cafeteria door swings open, and JACOB enters. With a warm smile, Jacob spots Jimmy and walks over.

JACOB
Hey, mind if I join you?

Jimmy looks up, surprised by the friendly gesture.

JIMMY
Uhm, sure.

Jacob takes a seat across from Jimmy, and the two strike up a conversation. Jacob's outgoing nature contrasts with Jimmy's shyness, but somehow, they click.

As days pass, Jimmy's lunch table becomes a place of laughter and shared moments. His loneliness fades away in Jacob's company.

CUT TO:

EXT. SCHOOLYARD - DAY

Jimmy and Jacob walk together, lost in a lively discussion about their favorite movies. Suddenly, JEROME, the school bully, appears with his cronies.

JEROME
Well, well, if it isn't the loner and his new sidekick.

Jimmy tenses up, fear evident in his eyes.

JACOB
(stepping forward)
Leave him alone, Jerome. What's your deal?

Jerome sneers, looking for trouble. He shoves Jimmy, who stumbles back.

JIMMY
(whispers to Jacob)
We should go.

But Jacob stands his ground, refusing to back down.

JACOB
(to Jerome)
You've got a problem with us being friends? Deal with it.

The tension is palpable as the schoolyard falls silent, all eyes on the confrontation.

CUT TO:

INT. JIMMY'S ROOM - NIGHT

Jimmy and Jacob huddle over a notebook, deep in thought.

JIMMY
What if we talk to a teacher about Jerome?

JACOB
Nah, let's handle this ourselves. I have an idea.

Jimmy nods, trusting Jacob's plan.

They sketch out a strategy, fueled by their newfound bond and determination to stand up to Jerome.

FADE OUT.
ended_at:
They sketch out a strategy, fueled by their newfound bond and determination to stand up to Jerome.

FADE OUT.
summary_till_now: In a bustling school cafeteria, lonely Jimmy yearns for a friend. Jacob's warm arrival changes everything, as their unlikely friendship blossoms into shared laughter and support. When school bully Jerome threatens their bond, Jacob's courage inspires Jimmy to stand up for himself. Together, they plot a brave strategy, united by their newfound friendship and determination to face challenges head-on.
